$3.99 Order Thai Tea with Boba $3.99 Order Reviews Tori Brown The food was all very fresh, hot, and delicious. The staff were all very kind and helpful. We were a table of 5 and we got all of our food within 20 minutes. Clean, friendly place. Definitely recommend! Payton Miracol Food was absolutely amazing!!! Super friendly staff! We were visiting from Tennessee and really wanted a good seafood place. This place definitely did NOT disappoint! We may need to make another trip here before we head back home! Even the chicken and fries my kids got was a pretty good serving size! All the way around it was a great place!!! Tera Williams This restaurant was nice and clean and it had a wide variety of items to choose from. The customer service was great with recommending items that was sure to please our taste buds. Even though we did not get the highly recommended gumbo, the items we did choose were fantastic. Our food came out nice and hot and the portion sizes were great. Delicious and filling, what a winning combination. Naarin Jakkor I truly enjoyed the seafood pot; it was bursting with flavor and clearly prepared with fresh ingredients. It was also served hot, which made it all the more delightful. I must say, the owner was incredibly friendly and made the experience even more special. It's always nice to be welcomed with such warmth! Tori Brown The food was all very fresh, hot, and delicious. The staff were all very kind and helpful. Order your favorite seafood dishes online and enjoy Seafood Pot from the comfort of your home! Order Now 5629 Rivers Ave, North Charleston, South Carolina, 29406 Seafood Pot, LLC All Flavor, No Compromise—Seafood the Southern Way (843) 737-5173 Contact Us Now At , we bring bold, Southern-style seafood to life right here in North Charleston. Specializing in fresh, flavorful dishes like gumbo and low country boils, we offer a taste of New Orleans to locals craving authentic coastal comfort food. Whether you're dining in or taking out, our seafood-only focus and warm, down-home approach make us the go-to spot for those who appreciate tradition done right. Seafood Pot, LLC Flavorful Seafood Excellence in North Charleston At Seafood Pot, LLC, we bring authentic New Orleans flavor to the heart of North Charleston. As a seafood-only restaurant, we’re proud to offer a menu that celebrates the bold, savory essence of Southern coastal cuisine. From our beloved Shrimp and Fish Plates to our hearty, flavor-packed Seafood Gumbo, we’re ... Read more Rooted in Tradition, Seasoned by the Sea Seafood Pot, LLC was born from a love of authentic Southern seafood and a mission to share the flavors of New Orleans with our North Charleston community. What started as a dream to bring something special to the neighborhood has grown into a local favorite, known not only for our gumbo but for the energy and ... Read more Highlights From Our Table Locals have spoken, and with a customer rating of 4.4, it’s clear that Seafood Pot, LLC has carved out a special place in the North Charleston dining landscape. We’re proud to serve up seafood that’s not only fresh but full of heart—and it shows in the plates that leave our kitchen and the stories our guests share.... Read more Signature Seafood Gumbo Known as the best gumbo in town, this dish is a cornerstone of our menu and a true taste of New Orleans. Rich, hearty, and packed with flavor—it’s a customer favorite for a reason. Low Country Boil Experience Our Low Country Boil is a celebration of Southern seafood tradition, featuring boiled crawfish, shrimp, and snow crab. It’s a must-try for anyone craving a bold and authentic coastal feast. Seafood-Only Concept At Seafood Pot, we do one thing and we do it well—seafood. By focusing exclusively on ocean-inspired dishes, we deliver quality, consistency, and deep flavor in every bite. Reviews Tori Brown The food was all very fresh, hot, and delicious.
